data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Adjusted Ultrasound, White Males, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPART45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LOPA [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: ROPART45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, ROPA [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: LBIART45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LBIA [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: RBIART45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RBIA [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: LINART45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LINA [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: RINART45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RINA [right internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: SUMWTA45
variable.description: Weight for MNA45_1 (= number of obs sites / 6) [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: LOPAWT45
variable.description: Weight for LOPART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: ROPAWT45
variable.description: Weight for ROPART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: LBIAWT45
variable.description: Weight for LBIART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: RBIAWT45
variable.description: Weight for RBIART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: LINAWT45
variable.description: Weight for LINART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: RINAWT45
variable.description: Weight for RINART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: MNA45_1
variable.description: Mean of the RT45 variables [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 1]
